root.name: Kileak: The DNA Imperative
root.description: Known as "Kileak The Blood" in Japan and Europe.Launch GameKileak: The DNA Imperative was a North American launch game for the original PlayStation (PSOne) back in 1995. The game launched alongside other PS1 launch titles that included:* Battle Arena Toshinden* ESPN Extreme Games* NBA JAM Tournament Edition* Raiden Project* Rayman* Ridge Racer* Street Fighter: The Movie* Total Eclipse Turbo* Power Serve 3D Tennis
